entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -20.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rankin Inlet Airport 9:00 PM CST Saturday 07 January 2023

Temperature: -20.8°C

Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 82 %

Dewpoint: -23.1°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow at times this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Snow beginning near noon. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Saturday 07 January 2023
